Over the years, quite a few American redditors have told me that I wasn't Latino because I'm white.
I had a few people call me a liar in a political discussion, when I mentioned a UN statistic, despite me linking to the UN's website as proof. Apparently the UN website doesn't count as proof of a UN statistic.
A few people called me a liar when I mentioned it was my birthday once.
Sadly it always seem to be that the minute a subreddit get's a decent amount of followers the trolls come out.
What I'm never sure of though is whether the trolls are actually arseholes or just thick.

As O- mosquitoes constantly attack me, I always have to travel with deet. I ran out whilst travelling across Thailand and in one night I was bitten at least 20 times on my ankle, so much so that my ankle swelled and I couldn't walk for 3 days.
When I'm not being savaged by mosquitoes I do donate blood as often as I can but if not completely on with my donating I get a good 3/4 calls a week for the blood people asking me to donate.
My dad and sis are O+ and my mum can't donate (cancer) so I'm the official emergency contact in case anyone needs blood :D
The fact that he's ok with slavery as long as they're not from the mainland.

I don't have an inner voice but when I'm calculating advance maths I see shapes forming.
I'll simplify here but imagine when you add 6 and 4. Well I'll see a small rectangle and square and they will fuse into a cube (10). It's hard to explain to people who can't do this but honestly it's a godsend.
For really long equations I'll see a mountain range and on the rare occasion (really advance unknown maths) I'll go into space as for some reason stars help me with new calculations.

I had this discussion with my family the other day. Turns out my mum has a full on voice in her head, so if she wants some water she'll talk to herself something like 'I'm thirsty, I think I'll go get some water'. Whereas my dad and I don't have this voice at all.
The way I would describe it to people who have a voice but can't understand not having a voice; imagine when you're eating and you just cut up your food and eat it. At no point are you talking to yourself saying, cut, chew etc. Now imagine if that is how is was for everything else that you do.
I find the whole idea of having an inner voice a bit annoying as to me it just seems like a waste of time and makes all tasks longer.

My partners old school were having a fundraising day so we volunteered to help out. There'd been an accident on the nearby motorway so loads of people were being delayed.
The hired clown was running a few minutes late so a teacher asked could someone fill in for 2/3 minutes. I stepped up and did a few minutes of juggling tricks.
When I finished she looked very confused and said that I never told her that I could do that, so I replied you never asked.
Then a bit later one of the bands was also running late so I volunteer to play the guitar and sing a few Disney songs (and getting the kids to join in).
She was genuinely furious when I got of the stage and she asked why I didn't tell her I could play the guitar. She did not find it amusing when I replied, again, that she never asked.
I get home two hours earlier than her every day so I use most that time to practicing a hobby in our attic (unofficial man cave which she never goes in to), so there's a few things I'm alright at that she has no idea about :D
It might seem odd not to tell her but she's a bit sensitive about the fact that I have 2 extra free hours than she does, and I know she'd be annoyed if she knew I was having fun whilst she was travelling (crazy I know but that's her), so she's under the impression that I spend most of that time cooking and cleaning :D :D :D

In Europe it's fine to cross when you like, you just have to use common sense.

I went to a strict Catholic school so we never had any sexual education classes.
I had to learn everything the hard way. A couple of girls in my school got pregnant in their teens, which I believe could 100% have been avoided if we received any sort of sexual education.
You can blame the parents sure but you have to remember the sort of parents that send their kids to a strict Catholic school are not going to be open minded enough to talk to their kids about sex.
The government should make it a legal requirement to teach kids about sex in school and get an outsider to do it, with no option to opt out.

As a man I'd never worn makeup in my life, then I was interviewed a couple of times for the news (in studios). The amount of makeup they put on me quite frankly was shocking. I'm only in my 20s and have good skin so honestly I didn't think I had anything to cover up.
I asked what each thing was for and the makeup artist told me 'this is nothing' the presenters get double what you're getting :O
You can buy it almost everywhere.

As a Spaniard our food is definitely about flavour.
If you want to butcher a dish fine but don't call it tortilla or paella; just give it a new name so as not to insult our traditional food.
Do it and show us pics of what they have available!

I grew up in a town in which it was normal for kids to wander around. Everyday I would hang out with my best friend and his dog.
We were on our way to our forest hideout, that we'd be working on for the last two years, and were just arriving to the forest when we saw a really dirty looking Asian guy walking along with a big stick. He then squatted down, pulled down his pants and started to take a crap on the floor.
He didn't know we were there until he heard us gasp. He looked back and said what the fuck you looking at and then began to chase us. I ran into the forest, towards our hideout, whereas my friend and his dog ran in the other direction.
I didn't stop running until I got to the hideout but when I stopped shaking it became apparent that the guy must have chased my friend instead. I slowly left the hideout and walked towards where I knew my friend would have hidden.
Except when I got near I saw my friend with very bloody hands. I ran over panicking and shouted if he was ok. Turns out he was but the guy had flipped out, started shouting at him and when his dog started barking loudly the guy beat his dog to death with his stick.
I couldn't believe it so I walked over to where my friend said his dog was and honestly this guy had definitely carried on hitting the dog well after he was dead as it looked like a bomb had gone off.
I can only imagine how traumatic that would have been to witness. Took my friend years before he could actually tell other people what had happened/what he'd seen.
We got back to his house and I had to tell his mum what happened; she called the police and I had to tell the story on his behalf as he just froze up.
Unfortunately the police never found the guy; they assume he was just a crazy bum wandering through town.

I have an old sports injury and from time to time I get a moderate nosebleed out of the blue.
I was at a bar with my girlfriend and her girlfriends when it happened. No biggy I told them not to worry and that it's an old sporting injury and happens from time to time and excused myself whilst I went to the loo to stop the bleeding and clean myself up. My girlfriend followed me, as she usually does, just to make sure I'm ok and don't make a mess as not everywhere has a mirror.
When we went back to our table her girlfriends were gone but I could see them outside, so we go outside and the idiots had called an ambulance for me. The make matters worse whilst I was apologise on the idiots behalf for wasting the paramedics time her friends were shouting at the paramedics to ignore me and take me to hospital. One even shouted 'he's lost a lot of blood, he could die without medical attention'.
As an accountant for HMRC I have argued with soo many people over this.
